title: The sim card is a digital sin card, which means you have to scan a QR code to activate it. However,
content:
Entered the right PIN / PUK codes didn't work.
Tried to scan the digital sim card, but can't access the camera.
Press and hold together : Power Button + Volume Down until Logo appear at LCD screen
If we see the menu at LCD screen, choose Wipe Data/Factory Reset with Volume Button to select and use Power Button to ok or enter. - didn't work
Pressed " recovery mode"
Checked if the phone was logged into another colleague's google suite / account. Not the case.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4
